EmailTemplate.subject: Act Now! $35,000 Trade In Credit Ends Soon!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Avoid obsolescence. Receive a $35,000 trade-in credit per display unit (no limit) when you update your CRT DU-870 to the Primus Elite DU-875 LCD display with Mid Canada Mod Center.
The Primus Elite DU-875 liquid crystal display upgrade delivers brighter, clearer, higher resolution images, and 2X the reliability of your old, obsolete DU-870 CRTs. The upgrade is an easy “plug and play” replacement that can be done in less than a day.
Act now! The DU-870 to DU-875 trade-in credit is only available through June 30, 2019.
I'M READY TO UPGRADE! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Mid_Canada_Mod_Center_Primus_Elite.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_mcmc_pe&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=primus+elite]]>
